（二）皮脂腺（sebaceous glands） 皮脂腺是一种可产生脂质的器官，属泡状腺体，由腺泡和短的导管构成。腺泡无腺腔，外层为扁平或立方形细胞.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Latin sebaceus (from sebum 'tallow') + -ous

means.word_mean: 1. containing an unusual amount of grease or oil;

auth_sentence.content: Each has a sebaceous gland that produces an oily substance, sebum.

auth_sentence.content: The opening of the sebaceous gland is filled with a plug of sebum mixed with sloughed-off skin cells.
